basic.description:
Practice in reading, writing, grammar review, and literary analysis. For students wishing to complete a major, medial, or minor Plan in French.
NOTE    Placement test required during Orientation Week.
NOTE    Also offered at the Bader International Study Centre, Herstmonceux. Learning Hours may vary.
LEARNING HOURS    216 (48L;24T;36O;108P)
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Français intermédiaire

extra.enrollment_requirement: Exclusion    No more than 6.0 units from FREN100; FREN101; FREN102; FREN110; FREN150.
